name: Immortal Seeker
description:
"Immortal Seeker" is a RogueLite game with a cultivation theme. As you journey, you can enhance your cultivation realm, find immortal weapons, learn secret books to defeat demons and monsters. Seek what is immortality and what is the Dao, and embark on your own path of cultivation.

The Path of Cultivation
The path of cultivation is a gradual process filled with challenges and opportunities. Only by improving yourself through experience can you survive in this world teeming with countless demons. Whether you choose to survive or dominate all depends on the strength of your cultivation.


Search for a suitable spiritual weapon and take appropriate doses of elixirs. If you can refine an extraordinary divine weapon, it will make your path of cultivation smoother and enable you to defeat countless enemies in an instant.


Apart from spiritual weapons and elixirs, your personal cultivation is also crucial. Cultivate unique divine abilities, seek secret manuals of inner alchemy, and try to comprehend their essence. This will further solidify your strength.


The path of cultivation can be lonely, so why not make friends along the way? Discover the paths of fellow cultivators, and make this journey a fun experience.


Assault of the Demonic Tide
There are multiple maps with distinct styles in the game, each teeming with different beasts and monsters. Do whatever it takes to survive! These precious experiences will make you stronger.
Encounter powerful enemies and unpredictable foes, stay calm and find their weaknesses to eliminate them. If you find a precious treasure chest, do not forget to open it. You may find an extraordinary spiritual weapon inside.


The Onslaught of Demons
Break through your realm by remaining steadfast and making gradual progress. The path of cultivation is full of challenges, seek ways to overcome them. Whether it is the Heart Tribulation, the Demon Tribulation, or the Heavenly Tribulation, there are corresponding methods. As long as you keep trying and seize opportunities, you will break through to a higher realm. Congratulations, fellow cultivator! The path of immortality is within your grasp!
